statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 0 \\ -6 \\ -6 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -17 \\ -15 \\ 27 \\ 21 \\ -20 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 0 \\ -6 \\ -6 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -17 \\ -15 \\ 27 \\ 21 \\ -20 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
